title: Clan wars cape (PvP Championship)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Clan wars capes are unobtainable items that are equipped in the jaw slot. They were used during the 2017 PvP Championships in order to achieve the team cape's effect without needing to wear one. They are identical to the regular Clan wars cape, except with a glow around the players' feet to indicate which team they are on.

content:
Clan wars cape (PvP Championship) was removed after an update.
As the contents of this page no longer exist in Old School RuneScape, this article is preserved for historical purposes.

Clan wars capes are unobtainable items that are equipped in the jaw slot. They were used during the 2017 PvP Championships in order to achieve the team cape's effect without needing to wear one. They are identical to the regular Clan wars cape, except with a glow around the players' feet to indicate which team they are on.

The capes have 16 variants to account for possible facial hair, where fake beards are built into the item to make it appear as if they had not been removed.

[[File:Clan wars cape (yellow) detail.png|150x150px|left]]
[[File:Clan wars cape (purple) detail.png|150x150px|left]]
'''Clan wars capes''' are [[unobtainable items]] that are equipped in the [[Worn Equipment#Jaw slot|jaw slot]]. They were used during the 2017 PvP Championships in order to achieve the team cape's effect without needing to wear one. They are identical to the regular [[Clan wars cape]], except with a glow around the players' feet to indicate which team they are on.

The capes have 16 variants to account for possible facial hair, where fake beards are built into the item to make it appear as if they had not been removed.
